DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , multiple dose study examine effect Acthar functional decline adult subject amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ( ALS ) . Approximately 195 subject enrol . Following screening period 28 day , subject ALS symptom onset ( define first muscle weakness dysarthria ) ≤ 2 year prior Screening Visit randomize 2:1 basis receive subcutaneous ( SC ) Acthar 0.2 mL ( 16 Units [ U ] ) daily ( QD ) SC match placebo 0.2 mL QD 36 week , follow 3 week taper .
